name: io.github.ertugrulakben/dep-oracle
description: Predictive dependency security engine. Trust scores, zombie detection, blast radius analysis.

tools.name: dep_oracle_scan
tools.description: Scan a project's dependency tree and generate trust scores for all packages.

tools.name: dep_oracle_trust_score
tools.description: Get the trust score (0-100) for a single package.

tools.name: dep_oracle_blast_radius
tools.description: Analyze the blast radius of a dependency if it were compromised.

tools.name: dep_oracle_zombies
tools.description: List all zombie dependencies with no maintenance activity in 12+ months.

tools.name: dep_oracle_suggest_migration
tools.description: Get safer alternative package suggestions for a given dependency.

tools.name: dep_oracle_typosquat_check
tools.description: Check whether a package name is a potential typosquat of a popular package.

tools.name: dep_oracle_compare
tools.description: Compare two packages side-by-side by computing trust scores for both.

tools.name: dep_oracle_report
tools.description: Generate a JSON report for a project. Optionally writes to a file.
